Improvements.Description: The variable 'ordered' is always set to true but it is used in a not operation (!ordered), which always results in false. This is unnecessary and can be replaced directly with 'false' in the method calls.

Improvements.Improvement: Use AssertJ for more fluent assertions
Improvements.Description: Instead of using assertEquals and assertTrue methods for test assertions, you can use AssertJ's assertThat method. It provides a more natural and fluent interface for writing assertions in your tests.
